creditline: Gift of Elissa and Paul Cahn
description: two panels with central opening; bands of dark brown with rows of stripes of various widths in rose, pink, olive, yellow, blue, pale green and cream, with bands of brown or red with white in wave designs; central pair of bands with floral motifs in reds, cream and blue
markings: on tag at center of one short side: SITES / AYMARA WEAVINGS / 15. Poncho / Tracht, 0-7 / 112 cm x 164 / SITES / 202/357-3168
title: Poncho
